A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I can understand why some fans are upset but it’s not as bad as some will make out. Yes\, it has plenty of flaws\, and could be re-edited to make a shorter far better Star Wars movie but the stunning cinematography and gasp moments just pushed it over the line to make it a better film than any of the prequels. Go see it and judge for yourself. You will be entertained! The jokes will make you laugh even if they are in the most part out of place.
